title: Authors and Citation
text: Maxwell Murphy. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Murphy M (2022). moire: MOI Allele Frequency Recovery Noisy Polyallelic Genetics Data. R package version 2.1.0, https://github.com/m-murphy/moire.
code: @Manual{,   title = {moire: MOI and Allele Frequency Recovery from Noisy Polyallelic Genetics Data},   author = {Maxwell Murphy},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 2.1.0},   url = {https://github.com/m-murphy/moire}, }

title: moire
text: moire package implementing MCMC based approach estimating complexity infection population allele frequencies polyallelic genomics data.

title: moire
code: # Install development version from Github remotes::install_github("m-murphy/moire")

title: moire
text: moire supports loading data either long format data.frame using load_long_form_data() wide format data.frame using load_delimited_data().
code: df <- read.csv("your_data.csv") data <- load_long_form_data(df)  # With data in appropriate format, run MCMC as follows mcmc_results <- moire::run_mcmc(   data$data, data$sample_ids, data$loci, data$is_missing )

title: Sample from the target distribution using MCMC — run_mcmc
code: run_mcmc(   data,   sample_ids,   loci,   is_missing = FALSE,   thin = 1,   burnin = 10000,   samples = 10000,   verbose = TRUE,   allele_freq_threshold = 1e-05,   eps_pos_0 = 0.005,   eps_pos_var = 1,   eps_pos_alpha = 0.5,   eps_pos_beta = 99.5,   eps_neg_0 = 0.005,   eps_neg_var = 1,   eps_neg_alpha = 0.5,   eps_neg_beta = 99.5,   max_eps_pos = 2,   max_eps_neg = 2,   max_coi = 20,   allele_freq_vars = 1,   adapt_allele_freq_vars = TRUE )

title: Sample from the target distribution using MCMC — run_mcmc
text: data Data used MCMC, expected input list lists numeric vectors, list element collection observations across samples single genetic locus. sample_ids Vector containing ordered unique identifier samples loci Vector containing ordered unique identifer loci is_missing Boolean matrix indicating whether observation treated missing data ignored. Number rows equals number loci, number columns equals number samples. Alternatively, user may pass FALSE data considered missing. thin Positive Integer. often sample mcmc, 1 means thin burnin Positive Integer. Number MCMC samples discard burnin samples Positive Integer. Number samples take burnin verbose Logical indicating progress printed allele_freq_threshold 0-1 Numeric. Lowest allowed value allele frequency. eps_pos_0 Numeric. Initial eps_pos value eps_pos_var Numeric. Variance used sampling eps_pos eps_neg_0 Numeric. Initial eps_neg value eps_neg_var Numeric. Variance used sampling eps_neg max_eps_pos Numeric. Maximum allowed value eps_pos max_eps_neg Numeric. Maximum allowed value eps_neg max_coi Positive Numeric. Maximum allowed complexity infection allele_freq_vars Positive Numeric. Variance used sampling allele frequencies adapt_allele_freq_vars Logical indicating whether adapt variance achieve acceptance rate .27 eps_pos_shape Positive Numeric. Shape parameter Gamma distribution eps_pos prior eps_pos_scale Positive Numeric. Scale parameter Gamma distribution eps_pos prior eps_neg_shape Positive Numeric. Shape parameter Gamma distribution eps_neg prior eps_neg_scale Positive Numeric. Scale parameter Gamma distribution eps_neg prior

title: Simulate data generated according to the assumed model — simulate_data
text: mean_coi Mean multiplicity infection drawn Poisson num_samples Total number biological samples simulate epsilon_pos False positive rate, expected number false positives epsilon_neg False negative rate, expected number false negatives locus_freq_alphas List alpha vectors used simulate Dirichlet distribution generate allele frequencies. allele_freqs List allele frequencies used instead simulating allele frequencies

title: moire 2.1.0
text: Implemented new error model removes sensitivity total number alleles locus Removed option marginalize latent genotypes complexity threshold bug fixes, documentation improvements

title: moire 2.0.1
text: Minor bugfix sampling caused computational slow

title: moire 2.0.0
text: Underlying model longer uses pseudo marginal MH algorithm. Instead, model augmented latent genotypes user defined complexity level sampled. Loci user defined complexity level latent state fully marginalized . Removed dependency GSL various bugfixes speedups

title: moire 1.1.1
text: fixed overflow bug dramatically increase computational costs fixed bug sampling complexity infection accepted updates weren’t recorded cases

title: moire 1.1.0
text: Added several new common functions analyzing data Added functions import data common formats format required Made errors independent parameter across samples Changed error model longer depend underlying number strains contributing alleles Removed multiple chain implementations. multiple chains desired, use multiprocessing Added progress bar duration MCMC

title: moire 1.0.0
text: Initial release moire.
